document.discussion_title: DNB : Oslo Børs - VASA06 - New bond issue to be listed on Oslo Børs on the 23.08.2016 | 4-Traders
document.topic_text: New bond issue to be listed on Oslo Børs on the 23.08.2016 Issue name: Vasakronan AB 16/21 FRN Ticker: VASA06 Instrument ID: 1302551 ISIN: NO0010770258 Segment: OBOC Country: NO Trading currency: NOK Current outstanding principal amount: 700 mill, tap Issue Interest accrual date: 19.08.2016 Maturity date: 18.08.2021 Coupon rate: 2.09 % p.a. (3 month NIBOR + 1.3 %) Sector list: Major Bond Issues Managers: Handelsbanken Capital Markets DNB Bank ASA , DNB Markets Central Securities Depository : VPS Approved prospectus available on: http://www.oslobors.no https://www.vasakronan.se Click here for more information: http://www.newsweb.no/index.jsp?messageId=407809 © Oslo Bors ASA, source Oslo Stock Exchange
